sense.name: create or devise something for the first time through thinking
sense.examples: In 2004, he invented a helmet made from coconut shell. My grandmother invented the peanutbutter, bacon and mayonaise sandwich. Galen invented the term 'gonorrhea' from the words for genital and flow. We are inventing the organizations of the 21st century. Prediction is hard, so instead I talked about inventing the future rather than predicting it.

sense.name: make up something fictional or untrue
sense.examples: That's quite a story you've invented. She invents a new personality and new interests for each new boyfriend.
